text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text: …… It'll be fine. Once mom and dad see my next race, they won't need to worry about me anymore.

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text: It'll be fine. I even have a plan on how to win. I'll make stronger moves…… and won't let up until the end.

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text: It'll be fine. I'm going to repay their kindness by running…… I'll show everyone my gratitude the way I know how.
